Job title: People Services Specialist - Project BasedLocation: Cairo, Egypt
Job type: TemporaryAbout the Job:Contract Management 
Hiring 
Onboarding
Offboarding 
Job Change 
Social insurance and Labour Office
IPT/LFH/Expatriation Job Purpose:Manage the hiring process from contract creation to onboarding  
Ensure that changes are correctly reflected in all related systems  
Manage all documents related to employee life cycle management (preparation, collection, validation, archiving)  
Address operational issues and follow through to resolution in an effective and timely manner 
Being the focal point with the service provider and manage the relation  with Social insurance and Labour Office
Coordinate with the service provider to:
Register the new Hires in the Social Insurance Authority
Unregister the departure employees from the Social Insurance Authority
Submit Social Insurance Form 2 on yearly basis
Collect the Hiring documents from selected candidates
Following up the on boarding process for new hires
Responsible for the mandatory orientation sessions for all new hires
Responsible for assigning the code of ethics training for external workers on iLearn
Ensure that we have all valid required hiring documents in the employee folder
Ensure that all personnel files sorted and updated
Ensure full adherence and compliance of all personnel processes with the Egyptian labour law and social insurance law
Follow up with all stakeholders to ensure smooth and timely offboarding process
Collect the Resignations/ Terminations reports from the HRBPs and direct managers
Get the employees signatures on all required documents (resignations, Form 6… etc.)
Ensure moving the departures Employee’s folders to the archive room
Supporting all concerned employees with reports
Manage the Physical and digital employees’ files archive
Manage the admin work to get the service from the service provider in a proper way
Perform other duties as assigned.
Respect of company’s values, code of ethics and social charterAbout You:Education: University Graduate with related background
Experience: in related on-boarding & off-boarding experience, employee relations & labor office experience will be an asset
Soft skills: very strong communication and negotiation skills, well organized, ready to work under pressure and to meet tight timelines
